WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 12.00 noon on 14 June 2024.
Condition of Rain:
Showers may occur at a few places in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Matara
via Colombo and Galle.
Winds:
Winds will be south-westerly in the sea areas around the island.
